survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Mobile Banking App Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their satisfaction with various features of mobile banking apps to help improve user experience and functionality.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use your bank's mobile app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency of app usage.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use your bank's mobile app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mobile banking app features do you use most often? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify popular features.

script.question_text: Which of the following mobile banking app features do you use most often? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall performance of your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall performance of your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using the mobile banking app in the past month?
questions.client_notes: Use a binary choice to identify frequency of technical issues.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using the mobile banking app in the past month?
